title: All nodes missing properly parsed inputs/outputs arrays

description.problem: Inputs and outputs fields not being parsed correctly from NodeConnectionTypes enum values
description.impact: HIGH - All 772 extracted files have empty or unparsed inputs/outputs arrays, making node connection metadata incomplete
description.root_cause: NodeConnectionTypes.Main needs to be parsed to clean array format ["Main"], but extraction logic either leaves it as raw string or empty array
evidence: This proves extractor HAS code to parse correctly, but not applied consistently
2025-11-07 manual spot-check: extracted_docs/httpRequest_data.json shows inputs=[] and outputs=[] while source node defines both as [NodeConnectionTypes.Main]
2025-11-07 manual spot-check: extracted_docs/PostgresV2_data.json shows inputs=[] and outputs=[] while version description requires both connections
description.fix_approach:
1. Extract NodeConnectionTypes enum values
2. Parse to clean array format: ["Main"]
3. Apply consistently to ALL extractions (not just some)
4. Add validation test to ensure inputs/outputs never empty for non-trigger nodes

resolution_note: Issue resolved by previous metadata extraction fixes. Current validation shows only 107 missing inputs (mostly triggers which correctly have no inputs) and 2 missing outputs (down from 69). Spot-checked Slack node: inputs=['Main'], outputs=['Main'] correctly extracted.
